title: Foodsharing-Utilities
name: foodsharing-utilities
description: Adds a few handy functions to the foodsharing website
author: Aggrobatics

preferences.name: autoLogin
preferences.title: Automatic Login
preferences.description: When active, the Addon will try to automatically login to https://foodsharing.de on Browser startup

preferences.name: msgIntervalTime
preferences.title: Interval for check on new messages:
preferences.description: Check for incoming messages every ... minutes (0 deactivates)

preferences.name: pickupIntervalTime
preferences.title: Interval for check on pickup-dates:
preferences.description: Check for, and notify me about 'soon' upcoming pick-up dates every ... minutes (0 deactivates checks and any notifications)

preferences.name: notificationTime
preferences.title: Notification Threshold:
preferences.description: I hereby define what 'soon' means in 'minutes before the deadline' (0 deactivates checks and any notifications; only notifies for 'today')
